content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, thank you for considering my apartment for rent. Based on the information I have, I believe we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. May I ask what you are willing to pay for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 1200 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your interest in the apartment, but I'm afraid I cannot accept that price. The apartment is only 25 square meters and I have other potential tenants who are willing to pay more. I'm willing to negotiate, but I would need a higher offer. May I ask what you are willing to consider?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 1300 Euros per month.

I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

I am dependable and responsible.

I don't want to talk about utilities or anything else.

I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible.

I agree to the price of 1300 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and I understand your desire to be on good terms with your landlord. However, I must say that the apartment is only 25 square meters and I have other potential tenants who are willing to pay more. I'm afraid I simply cannot accept the offer of 1300 Euros per month. I would need a higher price in order to make it a mutually beneficial agreement. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
name: Heinrich Heine
